attributes.action: The goverment needs to change there ruling on 24 notice for detentions
attributes.additional_details:
We want the goverment to scrap the policy of detentions with out 24 hour notice
The goverment should consider the children's parents waiting for their children and the worry and anxiety it will cause
The childrens well being is being put in danger and parents will be unaware
Parents may think their child has been kept on detention when they could of actually been abducted and this could hinder any early attempts of finding them safely
This policy could have a negative effect to other siblings in the family
As parents we have a duty of care to our children and the goverment have set a policy that has a direct impact on that.
